OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A banging punch of a blow strikes your enemy downwards...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your swing ends with a resounding bang that your opponent will never hear.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You swing a hook with your weapon and connect brutally...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the lack of resistance from your foe tells you your brutal strikes can slow.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Two solid objects connect producing a booming clang…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...so obvious is the strike you mouth the word
before finishing your enemy with that exalted sound.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You wind up and swing, as if playing a child's game, smiling as your strike batters your foe...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …your brutal assault leaves your opponent beaten and battered.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A well-executed reverse-swing slams into your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …this opponent will not rise after your wide arching swing slams him down.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your strike lands with a sharp cracking sound...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your fierce swing ends in a resounding crack. A sound you can be proud of.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A swift ramming jab surprises your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the fight ends in a deadly ram to the vitals.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your expertly executed swing hits with a satisfying crunching sound...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a grisly crunch echoes across the battlefield, announcing to all the winner of this fight.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A solid bash breaks through your opponent's guard...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you bash down, shattering something critical before your enemy dies without a sound.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You smash into your foe with a pulverizing force you weren't aware you possessed…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a gruesome slam leaves your enemy a pulverized wreck.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A bone-jarring hit sends gratifying shockwaves vibrating up your arms…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …your smash ends with a bone-jarring thud, leaving your enemy laid out in a contorted heap.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your swing slams into your enemy with teeth-rattling force...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you catch your opponent hard with a teeth rattling blow that will put an end to this fight.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A daring and ferocious swing crashes into your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with unrelenting ferocity, you batter your enemy to an unceremonious death.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your quick jab lands with jarring force...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a winding swing connects, jarring your enemy's core and leaving them a broken wreck.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A spinning haymaker lands with a drumming bang....
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...and your final blow lands with a sound like a giant's drumbeat, announcing your foe into the afterlife.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You swing around, pummeling your enemy with wild abandon...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you relentlessly pummel your enemy, battering him to an untidy mass of history.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your swing collides with thunderous force...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...destroying your opponent with a thunderous blow fills you with renewed vigor.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A mighty overhand swing produces a loud crack as it smacks into your foe...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your mighty roundhouse crashes through your enemy's guard demolishing everything before it.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A fierce blow with the broad side of your weapon smacks into your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the stunning ferocity of your blow leaves your foe a brutalized wreck.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your heart begins to pound even faster as reverberations of your strike excites it…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you pound your enemy into the surface below. This outcome tips towards the edge of satisfaction.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A demolishing blow careens into your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your blow settles this fight and demolishes any idea that this enemy could ever defeat you.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: In a moment of savagery, you overwhelm your opponent with a brutal strike...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with a surge of vigor you overwhelm your opponent, striking blow after blow until there is no need to strike again.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your heavy swing forces something to break off your opponent and snap past you through the air...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a crushing overhand strike leaves your foe both broken and defeated.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A tremendously fortunate swing slams into your enemy with a heavy thwack...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with your foe now dead, onlookers would be inspired by the tremendous effort you have displayed today.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: An accurate strike leaves your foe with a throbbing contusion...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you strike so hard that your arm starts throbbing, your foe is no longer able to feel anything at all.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your lumbering blow lands with great force sending your opponent reeling...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a final lumbering strike smashes through your foe's defenses, bringing them down for good.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Leaping forward, your whole body twists in an exaggerated arc as your weapon powers into your foe...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you wheel around with a massive, exaggerated swing, smashing your opponent out of the fight.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A forceful lunge punches straight through your enemy's defenses...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your weapon punches home like a battering ram, ploughing deep into your opponent's expiring body.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The visceral hit expels a trail of fluid from your unfortunate opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a clean and powerful hit creates a fatal expulsion of viscera.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The force of your uppercut physically lifts your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...an explosive uppercut flips your opponent clean over and leaves them in a motionless heap.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With tremendous force, your weapon mashes into the soft area of your opponent, onlookers would grimace at the sight...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ... you look down to see vital parts of your opponent have been mashed into pulp. Well done.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: There is no defense your foe can muster against the brutish might of your attack...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...even your most brutish of ancestors would be proud of how you just ended your foe's life.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The quality of your weapon is tested with this brutal collision...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your attack connects in a ferocious collision, leaving your enemy in an unrecognizable heap.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your cascade of attacks leave your foe caked in their own runny ichor...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the full weight of your weapon strikes in an unrelenting cascade leaving only a mixture of foul fluids and gore.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: As you pummel your opponent's defenses, a slanting strike plunges into their side...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you fiercely pummel your foe until their slack frame slumps to the ground.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Without hesitation you unleash a concussive blow which shakes your opponent's core...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...shifting your weight as you swing, you feel the concussive force of your attack flatten your enemy's form.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your swift barrage of strikes unfolds your foe's defenses...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your attack becomes a blinding barrage of strikes and your opponent is unable to prevent their own devastation.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Twisting your hips as you swing your weapon, you bring the full weight of your body snapping into your foe...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...snapping your enemy's body with the intensity of your blows, you watch them crumble in front of you.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The perfect imprint can be briefly seen where the weighty might of your blow landed...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …your weighty haymaker forces your opponents  unfortunate life from their body.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A quick snap of your weapon results in an audible pop as it connects with your enemy…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …this closing strike ends with a gruesome popping sound.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Like two clashing rams, your weapon impacts soundly against your opponents...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a loud clash stamps your roundhouse strike while utterly demolishing your foe.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: An arrhythmic yet effective blow surprises your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a deliberately arrhythmic swing of your weapon brings this contest to a close!

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your blow smacks your enemy like a boulder…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with a thunderous smack you put this enemy down for good.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your staggered and hesitant steps throw your opponent's rhythm off just long enough for you to land a quick strike...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your opponent suddenly staggers, allowing you to easily bring home a finishing blow.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: An expert swing pierces your enemy's defenses…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with a practiced form that any expert would be proud of, you end your opponent's life with grace.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With a whacking thud, your blow slams into your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a spinning strike connects with a loud whack, demolishing everything before it.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A charging strike ruthlessly batters your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...charged with all of your strength, your stroke fells your enemy with a gruesome splat.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You drive past your enemy's defenses with a relentless fervor…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...through relentless determination, your enemy perishes under your repeated onslaught.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your whipping blow hits with a grisly crack...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: … onlookers would grimace during this grisly execution.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A clever jab slips right past your enemy's guard...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...cleverly battering away your enemy's defenses, you finish off your foe with a hard swing to the vitals.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your weighty strike hits with a resounding thwack...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a loud thwack echoes through the air, announcing your foe's deadly misstep.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A skillful swing strikes true with gratifying resolution....
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a skillful swing slips past your enemy's guard and cracks them directly in the midsection.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You deliver a well-placed thrust, the force of it reverberating through your body...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...they say what you do today reverberates throughout history. After that tremendous blow, you hope the saying is true.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Feinting left, you trick your opponent, who dodges straight into your strike from the right...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...tricked into thinking you were open to attack, your opponent never saw the blow that finished them.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shifty footwork befuddles your foe, and you dance in to deliver a painful strike...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your shifty moves create a moment of indecision in your foe, giving you the opportunity you need to finish them off with an unexpected lunge!

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You turn aside the enemy's weak attack and deliver a violent reprisal...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you drive into your foe's center without mercy, finishing them off with a violent killing blow.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Having anticipated your enemy's over-extension, you deftly sidestep , delivering a smooth and fluid strike...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the enemy foolishly acts in anticipation of your next move, providing the perfect opportunity for you to react unexpectedly and easily end the contest.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You deftly contort around your opponent's attack and land an impressive strike of your own...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...having disabled your opponent with a series of impressive strikes, you leave them in a contorted heap.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The temerity of your attack makes you seem the daredevil, your driving below showing no regard for your own safety...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...ignoring your opponent's attack, you dive like a daredevil through their guard and land a legendary blow.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your foe's senses betray them as you whirl quickly and catch them from an unexpected direction...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your foe's ruptured and splintered body betrays them, and they expire messily before you.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Like a whip, a long, theatrical swing, strikes downwards into your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you belt your victim with a violent downward swing, ending the exchange.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Using the strength in your whole body you leap forward during this one effective blow...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you leap high, using momentum to bring your weapon down on your opponent with enough force to finish them off.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With theatrical flair you produce your weapon, seemingly from thin air, and smash it into your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with a theatrical flourish, you execute a flawless attack that ends this conflict.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: As though actors in a comedy, your unwitting opponent plays the part of the victim admirably...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the impact sends your foe sprawling comically like a thrown rag-doll.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You exploit a gap in the enemy's defenses to land a punishing weapon slap...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...exploiting your knowledge of the enemy's anatomy, you land a finishing strike where they are most vulnerable.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: In a single moment, your weapon describes a graceful and unavoidable arc of destruction...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you sunder your opponent while gracefully and effortlessly avoiding the spray of viscera that exits the wound.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With practiced efficiency you breach your assailant's defenses...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you tactically breach their defenses and then deliver a swift, almost merciful, deathblow.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your almost playful movements strike a blow that is anything but childish...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you grab your opponent and introduce them to your weapon, dropping them playfully like a broken toy.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your pattern of pivots and parries immediately throws your opponent off rhythm, allowing your skillful counterattack to strike true...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...disrespecting the rhythm of combat you suddenly lash out and your weapon snatches your foe's life in a brutal collision.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Seizing the initiative you dash forward, letting your weapon sink into your foe...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...closing in and striking in one fluid motion you collapse your enemy in front of you with a dash of finesse and flair.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You rain down a series of jabbing blows, besieging your adversary until one vicious shot lands ...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...having besieged your hapless enemy, you completely overwhelm them and end their struggle with life.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: What looks to be a light slap, actually knocks your opponent dangerously off-balance...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a heavy slap from the broad side of your weapon sends your foe spinning to their grave.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You shove your opponent's defenses aside and deliver a smack of a blow....
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you're not sure which of your blows was the finisher, but this last strike shoves your opponent down like a bag of rocks.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Stiff and stilted, your style bewilders your opponent allowing you to strike home with ease...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...bewildering your adversary with an unbalanced attack, you watch them fall with an unsettling crack.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You feel, more than hear, something snap deep within your foe....
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a solid blow strikes home, something snaps, and your foe collapses lifelessly.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Contorting to avoid a counterattack, you snap your weapon into the enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...twisting and contorting you confound your foe, sending them to their grave in a mist of pain and confusion.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Traveling in a short arc, your shot lands in a crushing collision...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...like an elite marksman, your shot crushes the life from your opponent instantly.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A crashing sound tells you your strike has landed true...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: your shot crashes down like a strike of lightning. Unlucky for your foe, as dodging lightning may have presented a better chance of survival.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot produces a solid but dull thud as it rams into your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …your amazingly accurate shot causes a weighty thud that puts an end to this one.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You lose track of your shot for a moment before hearing a satisfying thump…
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your shot speeds forward like a ray of light, striking its target with a gruesome thump.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You hear a loud splat as your powerful shot smashes into your enemy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a powerfully delivered shot rips through the open air and lays your enemy low.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot packs a wallop as it strikes your foe and ricochets downwards...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: …your shot brings this fight to an end with a vicious wallop to your enemy's center.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A mighty blast of a shot lands with a loud clap...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...smashing your enemy with a loud crack forces your foe to go rigid.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your savagely accurate shot lands with a resounding thump...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...if your God judged you on this exact strike, you would receive resounding approval.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot connects and splinters pieces off your enemy ...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your shot causes something in your opponent's body to splinter and break. This foe will die slowly.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You watch as your sturdy ammunition survives the impact with your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your opponent would have survived your shot, if a sturdy defense was mounted a moment sooner, alas it was not.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You are pleased to see your strike has racked your opponent into a moment of dysfunctionality...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...racked by the results of your blow, your opponent's body fails and falls slowly downwards.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot carries your message of deadly intent with speed and accuracy.
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...judging the speed of your opponent's movements, you time the perfect shot. You can trust this opponent will be moving no more.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With long, drawn-out and careful aim, you loose a shot that hits home...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the projectile flies in a long, drawn-out arc, perfectly incapacitating its target.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The missile bucks and bounces off the target in a stinging impact...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with stinging force, your shot smacks the enemy over backward, ending their fight.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your careful aim is rewarded with a satisfying clink...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a high-pitched clink will echo in your opponents ears as they journey to the afterlife.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: You intentionally lob your shot into an arc, allowing your opponent's momentum to cause most of the damage during collision...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...a high lob comes down square on your target, they never  saw their end coming.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The weapon hisses through the air like a snake, biting into its victim's center...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the hiss of your weapon speeding towards them is the last thing your opponent will ever hear.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: At first it looks as though your shot will miss, but instead it clips your target with what appears to be a very painful strike...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the shot clips your target and initially seems ineffective, but then they slowly collapse.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The missile stops dead as all force is transferred into your target, driving them backwards...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the missile rams home with deadly force, driving all life out of your target.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The projectile's impact is delivered with a resounding ring...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the solid impact sets your foe ringing like a bell that has tolled its last.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot takes an unusual curve in midair, before leaving a noticeable dent in your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the missile's curved trajectory connects cleanly, impacting the innards of your foe and ending this fight.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your opponent overreacts to your shot as if hit by something far more heavy...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your shot forces your opponent to shudder before becoming stiff and dropping with a heavy thud.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: As if butted by a great ram, your opponent recoils awkwardly from your shot...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...with all your force behind it, the shot butts your opponent over, they will never stand again.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The unusually low arc of your shot looks to land short of your enemy before spinning upwards directly into a surprisingly solid strike. That was odd...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ..the low-arching missile immobilizes your opponent, leaving them helpless against death.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot fights against the thickness of the air, producing an audible whistle before landing properly within your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the shot whistles through the air, laying your enemy low with a telling blow.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Sent with form an instructor would be proud of, your shot hums through the air and slams into its intended target...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the missile and its target fall in opposite directions, the projectile still humming from the impact.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A sharp crack sounds as your shot penetrates what little defense your opponent could muster...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the shot wrenches your foe around with a savage crack that sends them sprawling downwards.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: This unexpected strike from afar leaves your foe visibly rattled...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the force of the impact violently rattles your opponent's core, rendering them unable to continue in any way.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your opponent overreacts to your shot as if they were blasted by a bucket of dreadful water...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the shot blasts through your foe, followed by a spray of innards.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The projectile barrels into its target with a solid, audible crunch...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...there's a sickening crunch as the projectile impacts with deadly might.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The speed and accuracy of your ranged attack catches the enemy completely by surprise...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your opponent reacts with surprise and bewilderment as the unexpected power of your shot brings them down.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your well-aimed shot splits all defenses and strikes home...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your well-aimed shot has precisely the intended effect, permanently removing your foe from this world.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A fault in the ammunition cause this shot to wobble in flight for a moment before hitting your opponent squarely...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the aftermath of your strike sets your foe wobbling briefly before they succumb to death and collapse.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: The missile tumbles oddly end-over-end and ploughs into your hapless foe...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...the missile transfers all of its force into the target, sending them tumbling down into a rigid mass.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With a snap of your wrist you sling your projectile and it strikes home...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ... a faint warble precedes the flight of your projectile, which you sling with deadly accuracy, incapacitating your target.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With an audible whip, you pelt the enemy, and are rewarded with a grisly crack...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...turning away as your projectile pelts the enemy, a sharp crack followed by a dull thud informs you they have fallen.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Your shot hammers home, sending tremors through your targets body...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your shot impacts your foe with the force of a carpenter's hammer, driving them to their death.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: Unseen, your shot blindsides your enemy, sending them into a reflexive spin...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...attacking from your target's blindside, your shot descends upon them like the shadow of death.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With heartless precision your projectile slams into your opponent...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your shot kills your opponent. While a heartless act, you know you've saved lives.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: With a mighty smack, the enemy is left with the impression of your weapon stamped on their hide...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...your foe's lifeless body slumps, forever bearing the indelible stamp of your ruthless attack.

OUTCOMES.STANDARD: A vicious blow strikes your enemy, ringing out like a weapon-smith's hammer...
OUTCOMES.DEATHBLOW: ...you viciously aim the finishing blow, putting an end to this conflict with a splattering overhand swing.
